title: PRD ReDesign: RX Product Page
background: The RX (Prescription) Product Page is one of the most important points in the medical treatment funnel. It's where users decide whether to begin the consultation process for a prescription medication.
goal: The page should clearly communicate trust, credibility, and simplicity - guiding users toward starting the online consultation.

characteristics: Arrive from search or marketing campaigns (Google Ads, SEO)
Need reassurance that the process is legitimate, fast, and discreet
Sensitive to price transparency and data security
Have previously used DoktorABC for another treatment
Expect an easy and fast process to start a new consultation
Trust the service but still want clarity on delivery and prescription details

success_indicators: +20% increase in conversion from RX product page → start consultation
+10% increase in completed paid orders from users who reached the RX product page
Maintain a bounce rate below 15% on RX product pages

design_sections.requirements: General USPs reused from homepage (Discreet & qualified treatments, Online consultation & prescription, 1-2 day delivery, Information security)
Company logo, Search button, Hamburger menu
Shows full path to the page (Home → Category → Product)
Product image, Product name, Share button, Dosage (number + unit), Package options with pricing, CTA button: 'Start consultation', Text below button, RX USPs
Text provided from ASO content team
Doctor screenshot, photo, name, title, short content, CTA: 'Learn more'
Expandable section titled 'Resources', Links and materials from ASO
Standard site footer (logo, accordion links, payment methods, certifications, address, disclaimer)

development_requirements.description: This design and structure apply to all RX product pages except those under the Cannabis category
Display the standard DoktorABC USPS component at the top of the page
Display the Navbar identical to other RX pages: Company logo, Search, Cart, My Account, Hamburger menu. Sticky while scrolling.
Display the CRM coupon banner showing active promotions. Content pulled dynamically from CRM.
Display breadcrumb navigation path: Home → Category → Sub-category → Product. Must update dynamically.
Product image, Stock label, Share button (opens share popup), Product name, Trusted Shops widget. Section adapts responsively for mobile and desktop.
Opens centered popup with: Title 'Share', Close (X) icon, 5 share options (Facebook, WhatsApp, X.com, Pinterest, E-mail), URL field with copy icon, 'Link copied' confirmation
Display RX USPS block: Prescription issued online, Delivered 1-2 days, Original German medicine, Advice via questionnaire
Display product's price information clearly. CTA button visually emphasized and localized per language (FR/DE).
Display dynamic line: 'You pay for your medication + treatment fee €18.90'. Treatment fee value pulled dynamically from DB. Text localized.
Display product description content (HTML) pulled from DB
Questions and answers come from the DB
Display 'Additional Treatments' section showing other RX treatments related to current product category. Use standard RX product card component. Content pulled dynamically from DB.
Add the SEO text widget for SEO team to manage optimized content for product page. Content from DB or BO.
Display section using same content and structure as production. Content and visuals from DB.
Display global privacy banner component. Text localized per country (FR/DE).
Add component matching design and structure used across other DoktorABC pages
Display component - static explanation of the process. Layout identical to homepage and RX category pages.
Display section pulling content dynamically from DB (same source and logic as current production)
